layman_description: Determines whether an item appears in the spawn menu when creating new players.
technical_description: Boolean setting that controls menu visibility for spawnable entities.
player_impact: New players may not see certain items available to spawn if this is enabled.

layman_description: Controls aggressive behavior when creatures are hit repeatedly during combat.
technical_description: Setting for entity aggression response to sustained damage input.
player_impact: Creatures become more dangerous and attack harder when you strike them multiple times.

layman_description: Hides the item a player or creature is holding from view.
technical_description: Boolean value that controls inventory item visibility in hands.
player_impact: You won't see what weapons or tools your character or enemies are carrying.

layman_description: Positions the left foot for vehicles and creatures to stand naturally on surfaces.
technical_description: Sets vertical and horizontal offset for left foot 3D shape.
player_impact: Creatures and vehicle occupants look less stiff and more realistic when standing.

layman_description: Angles the left foot to match the terrain or vehicle surface.
technical_description: Defines rotational orientation for the left foot's 3D shape.
player_impact: Animations look smoother as feet properly rotate with the ground beneath them.

layman_description: Positions the right foot for vehicles and creatures to stand naturally on surfaces.
technical_description: Sets vertical and horizontal offset for right foot 3D shape.
player_impact: Creatures and vehicle occupants achieve balanced stance on uneven terrain.

layman_description: Angles the right foot to match the terrain or vehicle surface.
technical_description: Defines rotational orientation for the right foot's 3D shape.
player_impact: Both feet rotate consistently with ground angles for natural-looking movement.

layman_description: Prevents a block from showing the keystone visual effect when placed near other blocks.
technical_description: Boolean setting that disables the keystone display picture for block placement.
player_impact: Keystones won't display their connecting picture when this block is nearby, reducing visual clutter.

layman_description: Silences the sound that normally plays when opening this item as a keystone.
technical_description: Disables audio output for keystone activation on this item.
player_impact: You hear no sound when accessing this item's keystone menu.

layman_description: The sound that plays when this trap or hazard hits something.
technical_description: Audio value played on collision or impact events.
player_impact: Traps produce distinctive warning sounds that players and creatures can hear.

layman_description: How full a container item starts when created, expressed as a percentage.
technical_description: Decimal value representing initial inventory container fullness.
player_impact: Some containers start with more or fewer resources already loaded inside.

layman_description: The raw materials this workbench accepts for crafting.
technical_description: List of material values that workstations consume in production.
player_impact: You must gather specific resources to use this workbench for crafting.

layman_description: How much material this workbench consumes per game tick during operation.
technical_description: Rate value for material consumption per tick interval.
player_impact: Workbenches consume resources faster or slower based on this setting.

layman_description: Whether this item is created automatically when the game loads.
technical_description: Boolean setting determining automatic spawning on world initialization.
player_impact: Some items will always exist in the world without needing to be placed manually.

layman_description: Tracks whether a creature or entity is actively moving in the game world.
technical_description: Boolean value indicating entity movement state.
player_impact: The game responds differently to stationary versus moving entities.

layman_description: Marks an item as essential to a quest objective.
technical_description: Boolean setting that tags items for quest tracking purposes.
player_impact: Quest items can't be dropped or traded away during active missions.

layman_description: The starting inventory items new players receive in Survival mode.
technical_description: List of items and quantities spawned with players in Survival difficulty.
player_impact: New survivors begin with water, food, and medical supplies to start their journey.

layman_description: The starting inventory items new players receive in multiplayer Survival mode.
technical_description: List of items spawned with players in multiplayer Survival difficulty setting.
player_impact: Multiplayer survivors start with slightly fewer supplies than single-player characters.

layman_description: The starting inventory items new players receive in single-player Survival mode.
technical_description: List of items spawned with players in single-player Survival difficulty.
player_impact: Single-player survivors receive different starting supplies than multiplayer mode.

layman_description: How much damage affects a creature's movement when hit in the legs.
technical_description: Multiplier value for leg damage effects on movement speed.
player_impact: Damaging a creature's legs significantly slows it down.

layman_description: The system that controls the local player character you're controlling.
technical_description: Class name for the player's avatar control system.
player_impact: Determines how your character responds to movement and action commands.

layman_description: When lock picking succeeds, this is the state the block reverts to.
technical_description: Block value that replaces successful lock-picked containers.
player_impact: Successfully pick-locked containers downgrade to a weaker version.

layman_description: How much experience this item gives when you loot it.
technical_description: Experience points value awarded on item acquisition.
player_impact: Looting this item builds your character's progression.

layman_description: A creature type that inhabits low-lying terrain areas.
technical_description: Empty creature setting for terrain-specific spawning behavior.
player_impact: Certain creatures appear more frequently in valley and lowland areas.

layman_description: How easily creatures at lower difficulty stumble when struck.
technical_description: Setting for basic-level creature stagger behavior on impact.
player_impact: Weaker creatures easily lose balance when you hit them.

layman_description: The maximum amount of fuel a vehicle's tank can hold.
technical_description: Capacity value for vehicle fuel storage in units.
player_impact: Larger tanks let you travel longer distances before refueling.

layman_description: The maximum health points a creature or player can have.
technical_description: Health pool value determining survival threshold.
player_impact: Creatures with higher maximum health take longer to kill.

layman_description: A creature type that lives in rocky or challenging mid-elevation terrain.
technical_description: Setting for terrain-based creature spawning in elevated areas.
player_impact: Medium-difficulty creatures spawn more often in hilly regions.

layman_description: A creature variant that gets angrier in mid-elevation terrain.
technical_description: Setting for aggressive mid-terrain creature spawning behavior.
player_impact: Creatures in hills become significantly more aggressive and dangerous.

layman_description: How easily creatures at medium difficulty stumble when struck.
technical_description: Setting for intermediate-level creature stagger on impact.
player_impact: Medium creatures have moderate balance and stagger easily.

layman_description: How medium creatures stumble and then attack in retaliation.
technical_description: Setting for combined stagger and aggression response behavior.
player_impact: Medium creatures recover quickly and attack with increased fury after being hit.

layman_description: Names of 3D shapes to hide when this block is modified.
technical_description: List of hidden 3D shapes that modify with block state changes.
player_impact: Modified blocks dynamically hide certain visual parts as they upgrade.

layman_description: How fast creatures move during nighttime hours.
technical_description: Movement speed multiplier value applied during night cycle.
player_impact: Creatures move significantly faster at night, making nighttime more dangerous.

layman_description: Prevents this block from blocking certain status effects or damage types.
technical_description: Boolean setting that disables protective effect filtering.
player_impact: This block offers no protection against certain attacks or hazards.

layman_description: An empty or undefined setting for flexible customization.
technical_description: Null setting value for optional property configuration.
player_impact: This optional setting has no current gameplay effect.

layman_description: How much energy this battery releases per charge cycle.
technical_description: Energy value per charge delivery from power storage.
player_impact: Batteries with higher output power more machines simultaneously.

layman_description: How much energy this fuel generator produces from each fuel unit.
technical_description: Energy output multiplier per fuel consumption unit.
player_impact: Generators with higher efficiency require less fuel to power your base.

layman_description: Whether this block requires electricity to function.
technical_description: Boolean setting for power requirement on block activation.
player_impact: Powered blocks won't work unless connected to an energy source.

layman_description: What kind of power supply this block needs to operate.
technical_description: Power input type value for energy source compatibility.
player_impact: Some blocks work only with constant power while others charge and discharge.

layman_description: Allows this weapon to fire continuously while the trigger is held.
technical_description: Boolean enabling automatic fire mode functionality.
player_impact: Weapons with rapid trigger spray bullets continuously instead of one at a time.

layman_description: Whether drinking this item reduces your water thirst stat.
technical_description: Boolean setting for water reduction on item consumption.
player_impact: Some drinks quench your thirst more than others.

layman_description: Returns the materials invested in this block when you pick it back up.
technical_description: Boolean enabling partial resource return on block removal.
player_impact: Removing this block returns some of the materials you spent building it.

layman_description: The sound that plays when you use this item to repair something.
technical_description: Audio value triggered during repair action sequence.
player_impact: Repair tools make distinctive sounds so you hear confirmation of repairs.

layman_description: Marks this item as a raw material that stacks in your inventory.
technical_description: Boolean setting for stackable resource inventory behavior.
player_impact: Resource items stack together to save inventory space.

layman_description: The sound this trap makes while actively running.
technical_description: Loop audio value during trap operation state.
player_impact: Active traps emit continuous sounds warning of their danger.

layman_description: The sound this trap makes while breaking down from damage.
technical_description: Audio value played during trap deterioration state.
player_impact: Damaged traps emit different sounds so you know they're weakened.

layman_description: The sound this trap makes when completely destroyed.
technical_description: Audio value played when trap reaches broken state.
player_impact: Fully destroyed traps make distinctive sounds confirming their failure.

layman_description: Adjusts the camera position when aiming through a scope.
technical_description: 3D positioning offset applied to camera during scope view.
player_impact: Scopes feel more realistic with adjusted view positions.

layman_description: Whether other players see damage dealt to this block in real-time.
technical_description: Boolean enabling live damage synchronization in multiplayer.
player_impact: Other players watch blocks take damage as you hit them.

layman_description: The smallest physical 3D shape size this block can shrink to.
technical_description: Minimum boundary box dimensions for block 3D shape.
player_impact: Blocks have minimum sizes preventing them from becoming too small.

layman_description: Whether an attack or ability shows a visual targeting picture.
technical_description: Boolean controlling targeting sight display functionality.
player_impact: Some attacks have visible targeting reticles while others don't.

layman_description: Displays ammo count and magazine indicator while aiming weapons.
technical_description: Boolean enabling ammunition display on weapon sight menu.
player_impact: You always see how many bullets remain loaded in your gun.

layman_description: The steepest angle a slope can have before becoming unclimbable.
technical_description: Maximum degree angle for traversable terrain incline.
player_impact: Extremely steep hills become impassable barriers.

layman_description: How much scent signature this item creates to attract creatures.
technical_description: Scent value determining creature detection range.
player_impact: Carrying certain items increases the chance creatures find you.

layman_description: The sound that plays when supply drops crash to the ground.
technical_description: Audio value triggered on impact event completion.
player_impact: Airdropped supplies announce their arrival with loud crashes.

layman_description: The sound that plays when a supply drop parachute deploys.
technical_description: Audio value triggered during parachute deployment event.
player_impact: You hear parachutes opening so you know supply drops are coming.

layman_description: The sound that plays when this entity first appears in the world.
technical_description: Audio value triggered on entity spawning event.
player_impact: Creatures and objects make distinctive sounds when they spawn.

layman_description: The sound this explosive device makes while activated.
technical_description: Audio value for device activation notification.
player_impact: Activated explosives beep or chirp before detonating.

layman_description: The warning sound this item makes before triggering an effect.
technical_description: Alert audio value played before action execution.
player_impact: Dangerous items warn you before causing damage or status effects.

layman_description: Which NPC traders can appear at this trading post.
technical_description: Trader type value list for NPC spawning settings.
player_impact: Different trader NPCs appear at different trading locations.

layman_description: Whether spawned creatures are hostile zombies or peaceful animals.
technical_description: Creature type setting for spawn behavior classification.
player_impact: Spawned creatures can be zombies that attack or animals that ignore you.

layman_description: Whether this block maintains full structural support regardless of damage.
technical_description: Boolean enabling constant structural integrity setting.
player_impact: Some blocks never collapse even when damaged.

layman_description: Whether this creature crushes spike traps when walking over them.
technical_description: Boolean for spike damage immunity on creature stomp action.
player_impact: Powerful creatures can destroy spike traps by stepping on them.

layman_description: How easily a creature loses balance when struck.
technical_description: Stagger response value for impact reactions.
player_impact: Creatures that stumble easily are easier to control during combat.

layman_description: How long a creature stays stunned when hit with a stun weapon.
technical_description: Duration value in seconds for stun effect application.
player_impact: Stun weapons disable creatures for longer with higher values.

layman_description: How long until a creature can be stunned again after recovering.
technical_description: Cooldown duration in seconds between stun applications.
player_impact: Creatures can't be repeatedly stunned if cooldown is high.

layman_description: The symmetry pattern applied when placing this block in mirror mode.
technical_description: Symmetry axis value for mirrored block placement.
player_impact: Blocks follow different patterns when you mirror them during building.

layman_description: Which tools can craft or repair this block.
technical_description: List of tool type values for crafting action compatibility.
player_impact: Only specific tools can repair or upgrade this block.

layman_description: What kind of activation causes this trap to fire.
technical_description: Activation trigger setting for trap mechanism.
player_impact: Traps activate by walking near them or using a switch.

layman_description: The sound that plays when you upgrade this item.
technical_description: Audio value triggered during upgrade action sequence.
player_impact: Upgrades make distinctive sounds confirming the enhancement.

layman_description: Hides this item from your inventory menu for cleaner display.
technical_description: Boolean setting for inventory visibility filtering.
player_impact: Hidden items don't clutter your inventory display.

layman_description: Which quest objectives this block can contribute to completing.
technical_description: Quest tag list values for objective fulfillment.
player_impact: This block helps complete quests that require power restoration.

layman_description: How quickly this vehicle speeds up from a stop.
technical_description: Acceleration rate value in units per second squared.
player_impact: Vehicles with higher acceleration feel snappier and more responsive.

layman_description: What item you need to fill this vehicle's fuel tank.
technical_description: Fuel item type value for vehicle refueling compatibility.
player_impact: Different vehicles need different fuel types to operate.

layman_description: How long this vehicle runs with idle power before consuming a liter of fuel.
technical_description: Idle efficiency value in seconds per fuel unit.
player_impact: Vehicles that idle longer preserve fuel during waiting periods.

layman_description: The top speed this vehicle can reach on flat ground.
technical_description: Maximum velocity setting in units per second.
player_impact: Faster vehicles cover ground quicker but may be harder to control.

layman_description: How far this vehicle travels on one liter of fuel.
technical_description: Fuel efficiency value measuring distance per fuel consumption.
player_impact: Vehicles with higher fuel economy travel farther before needing refueling.

layman_description: How loud this vehicle is when moving, attracting creatures nearby.
technical_description: Audio volume value affecting creature detection range.
player_impact: Loud vehicles attract more creatures from greater distances.

layman_description: Probability that a found vehicle starts when you first interact with it.
technical_description: Success percentage value for vehicle ignition on interaction.
player_impact: Some vehicles need multiple attempts to start while others start reliably.

layman_description: How long you must wait after trying to start a vehicle before it turns on.
technical_description: Startup delay duration in seconds after ignition attempt.
player_impact: Vehicles take varying amounts of time to start up.

layman_description: How much fuel this vehicle's tank holds.
technical_description: Tank capacity value in fuel storage units.
player_impact: Larger tanks let you drive longer distances without refueling.

layman_description: Whether this item survives being submerged in water.
technical_description: Water resistance value determining submersion durability.
player_impact: Waterproof items won't break or degrade when you swim with them.

layman_description: The position of wires on this block when powered.
technical_description: 3D positioning offset for electrical wire display.
player_impact: Wires connect to blocks from appropriate positions for realistic appearance.

layman_description: The menu window that displays for this workbench when you interact with it.
technical_description: Menu interface value for workstation interaction display.
player_impact: Different workbenches show different crafting menus.

layman_description: How much air resistance affects vehicle movement and spinning.
technical_description: Drag coefficient values for aerodynamic friction simulation.
player_impact: Vehicles with higher air resistance slow down faster when you stop driving.

layman_description: Whether quest items can be dropped and removed from inventory.
technical_description: Boolean setting for quest item disposal permission.
player_impact: Quest items might be locked in your inventory preventing their removal.

layman_description: Whether this quest can always be accepted regardless of progression.
technical_description: Boolean enabling unrestricted quest acceptance without prerequisites.
player_impact: Some quests become available immediately while others require prior completion.

layman_description: The maximum altitude this flying vehicle or entity can reach.
technical_description: Altitude limit value in world height units.
player_impact: Flying vehicles can't go above certain altitudes preventing escape to sky.

layman_description: The engine type this vehicle uses for power and movement.
technical_description: Engine class value copied from vehicle configuration.
player_impact: Different engines provide different fuel efficiency and power output.

layman_description: The probability that the engine stalls and shuts down while running.
technical_description: Engine failure percentage value per operation cycle.
player_impact: Unreliable engines may shut off during travel forcing restarts.

layman_description: Maximum number of instances of this quest you can have active simultaneously.
technical_description: Concurrent quest limit value for quest tracking.
player_impact: Some quests can only be completed one at a time while others allow multiples.

layman_description: Which vehicle parts disappear when you install certain modifications.
technical_description: Hidden 3D shape name value for modification cosmetics.
player_impact: Vehicle upgrades change the visual appearance by hiding original parts.

layman_description: The angle at which vehicle modifications are installed relative to the base.
technical_description: Rotational offset value for mod installation orientation.
player_impact: Modifications align correctly based on this rotational setting.

layman_description: How much damage protection this vehicle part provides.
technical_description: Damage reduction multiplier value for armor effectiveness.
player_impact: Heavily armored vehicle parts take less damage in combat.

layman_description: The visual effect shown when this vehicle engine is damaged or broken.
technical_description: Particle effect path value for damage state visualization.
player_impact: Damaged engines show smoke and fire to indicate their condition.

layman_description: The sound that plays when pedaling this bicycle or human-powered vehicle.
technical_description: Loop audio value for pedaling action repetition.
player_impact: Bicycles make rhythmic pedaling sounds as you ride them.

layman_description: How many coal chunks this block yields when harvested.
technical_description: Coal output value for resource gathering calculation.
player_impact: Mining coal produces more or fewer chunks based on the source.

layman_description: How many paper sheets this block yields when harvested.
technical_description: Paper output value for resource gathering calculation.
player_impact: Harvesting paper sources produces varying amounts of material.

layman_description: How many snowballs this block yields when harvested.
technical_description: Snow resource output value for gathering calculation.
player_impact: Snow sources produce different amounts of snowballs when dug.

layman_description: Whether this quest can only be accepted and completed once per character.
technical_description: Single-instance quest completion setting.
player_impact: Some quests are permanent story missions that happen only once.

layman_description: How much stamina it costs to use or operate this vehicle.
technical_description: Stamina consumption value per operation action.
player_impact: Operating vehicles costs stamina limiting how long you can use them.
